com.acclivyx.rules
Interface IRule

All Known Implementing Classes:
AverageIsGreaterThenRule, Rule, SequenceIntegerRule, TwoArgsGreaterThenRule, TwoArgsSpanGreaterThenRule
public interface IRule

All Rules implement some instance of RuleArgs and either throw an invalid argument exception or return results.

Author:
Barton

Method Summary
 RuleResult process(RuleArgs args)
          Apply the rules for the args and return the results or throw exception if args are inappropriate for this rule
